price: Kaya nagsabi siya: “Walang iba [ang Qur’ān na] ito ay kundi isang panggagaway na ipinapasa-pasa.
arabic: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ يُؤۡثَرُ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faqāla in hādhā illā siḥ'run yu'tharu
